aboutIntro.title: Who We Are
aboutIntro.desc:
Blaze Media is an innovative marketing and events agency dedicated to helping businesses grow. We create impactful campaigns and unforgettable experiences that connect brands with the right audience and deliver real impact.

We believe in building strong partnerships with our clients, understanding their unique needs, and creating tailored solutions that exceed expectations.

sectionHeading.title: Frequently Asked Questions
sectionHeading.desc: Get answers to the most common questions about our services and process.

accordionContent.title: What services does Blaze Media offer?
accordionContent.content:
Blaze Media provides full marketing solutions including:
- Social media management
- Content creation (design, video, copywriting)
- Paid ads (Meta, Google, TikTok)
- Branding & visual identity
- Marketing strategy & consulting

accordionContent.title: Do you offer customized marketing plans?
accordionContent.content: Yes! Every brand is different, so we create tailored strategies based on your goals, budget, and target audience.

accordionContent.title: How long does it take to see results?
accordionContent.content:
It depends on the service, but generally:
- Branding & content: visible improvement within the first month
- Paid ads & growth campaigns: results usually start showing within 2-4 weeks

Marketing is a process—not magic, but we make it effective.

accordionContent.title: Do you handle everything or just social media?
accordionContent.content:
We can do both.
You can choose:
- A single service (like social media or ads)
- Or a full marketing package where we handle everything end-to-end

accordionContent.title: How do we start working together?
accordionContent.content:
Simple:
- Contact us
- We schedule a quick call
- We understand your needs
- We send a proposal
- Let the magic begin

accordionContent.title: What makes Blaze Media different?
accordionContent.content:
Creative thinking + data-driven strategy.
Clear communication.
A team that treats your brand like it’s their own.
We don’t just market—we build brands.

accordionContent.title: Can you work with our existing brand identity?
accordionContent.content: Absolutely. We can either develop a new identity or enhance what you already have.
